main_menu.message: Loan guidance-nu 1 amarthuka. Bank agents-nu 2 amarthuka.

income_check.message: Ningalude masa varumanam ethra? Shambalam 10000-il thazhe aanengil 1 amarthuka. 10000-um 20000-um idayil aanengil 2 amarthuka. 20000-il kooduthal aanengil 3 amarthuka.

agent_contact.message: Nanni, oru local financial helper ningale udan bandhapedum.
agent_contact.sms_body: Nanni, oru local financial helper ningale udan bandhapedum.

result_mini.message: Ningal mini loans-inu anuyojyananu. Avasyamaya rkkhakal Aadhar-um Bank Passbook-um aanu. Aduthulla bank shakha sandarshikkuka. Nanni.
result_mini.sms_body: Mini loans-inu yogyatha. Docs: Aadhar, Bank Passbook. Bank sandarshikkuka.

result_small.message: Ningal cheriya personal loans allenkil small business loans-inu arharanu. Avasyamaya rkkhakal Aadhar, Bank Statement, Address Proof enniva aanu. Aduthulla bank shakha sandarshikkuka. Nanni.
result_small.sms_body: Small Personal/Business loans-inu yogyatha. Docs: Aadhar, Bank Stmt, Address Proof. Bank sandarshikkuka.

result_regular.message: Flexible repayments-ulla regular bank loans-inu ningal arharanu. Aduthulla bank shakha sandarshikkuka. Nanni.
result_regular.sms_body: Regular bank loans-inu yogyatha. Aduthulla bank shakha sandarshikkuka.
